scripts.build: bash -c 'set -euo pipefail; rm -rf ../../dist/extension ../../dist/pdp-rewriter-extension.zip; mkdir -p ../../dist/extension; rsync -a --exclude node_modules/ ./ ../../dist/extension/; (cd ../../dist/extension && zip -qr ../pdp-rewriter-extension.zip .); echo Built ../../dist/pdp-rewriter-extension.zip'
